sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './form.css' import axios, { AxiosRequestConfig } from 'axios'; import { Imovel } from '../types/imovel' import { BASE_URL } from '../utils/requests'; export default function FormCadastro() { const navigate = useNavigate() const [imovel, setImovel] = useState('') React.useEffect(() => { axios.post(`${BASE_URL}/imovel`) .then(response => { setImovel(response.data) }) }, []) const handleSubmit = (event: React.FormEvent) => { event.preventDefault() const titulo = (event.target as any).titulo.value const imagem = (event.target as any).imagem.value const config: AxiosRequestConfig = { baseURL: BASE_URL, method: 'POST', url: '/imovel', data: { title: titulo, image: imagem } } axios(config) .then(() => { window.alert("Imóvel cadastrado com sucesso") navigate("/") }) .catch(() => { window.alert("Ocorreu um erro ao cadastrar o imóvel") }) } const logradouro = document.getElementById('logradouro') const checkCEP = (e: { target: { value: any; }; }) => { const cep = e.target.value.replace(/\D/g, '') console.log(cep) fetch(`https://viacep.com.br/ws/${cep}/json/`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data) const logradouro }) } return (

Cadastro de Imóvel

) }
